card_buttons_type.label: What to show
card_buttons_type.info: 'Combined' shows 'Add to cart' only for single-variant products

img_hover.label: Hover effect
img_hover.info_for_media_count: High media count affects your store’s performance

enable_product_darken_background.label: Color image background
enable_product_darken_background.info: The color appears behind the image and shows through, creating a blended effect.

product_card_rating.info: To show dynamic product rating, add a product review app

color_swatches_setting_description.content: Adjust their appearance in Theme settings > Swatches

buttons_setting_header.paragraph: ADD QUICK VIEW to the Aside (former Overlay) group for correct operation

product_badges_settings_header.info: Adjust their appearance and colors in Theme settings > Product badges

product_badges_settings_description.content: To show the badges, add the 'Product badges' block on the product page or go to Theme settings > Product cards

custom_badge_1_description.content: Create your own badges by linking them to [product tags](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/using-tags)

settings_description.content: We recommend that you use no more than two font families for your store. [Learn how fonts affect the store speed](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

header_icons_font_setting.paragraph: Applies to icon labels in the header

image_picker.label: Favicon image
image_picker.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

hide_checkout_button.label: Hide checkout button
hide_checkout_button.info: Applies to transitional drawer or popup, doesn't apply to the 'Drawer only' cart type

free_shipping_bar.paragraph: Add the goal in your store's main currency, then match the goal with your [shipping rate](https://admin.shopify.com/settings/shipping) or [automatic free shipping discount](https://admin.shopify.com/discounts).

primary_swatch_option_header.info: Show swatches in product cards, product pages, and filters

primary_option_name.label: Option
primary_option_name.info: Fill in the relevant option name from your admin to turn on swatches

primary_custom_colors_and_patterns.label: Custom colors and patterns
primary_custom_colors_and_patterns.info: Place each rule in a separate line. [Learn how to add color swatches](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/theme-settings/swatches#custom-colors-and-patterns)

secondary_swatch_options_header.info: Show swatches for more than one option in product pages and filters

secondary_option_names.label: Options
secondary_option_names.info: Fill in relevant option names from your admin, place each in a separate line

secondary_custom_colors_and_patterns.label: Custom colors and patterns
secondary_custom_colors_and_patterns.info: Place each rule in a separate line. Learn how to add color swatches

input_style.label: Input style
input_style.info: Applies to account, registration, blog post comment forms, and other input fields without a separate setting

product_card_reviews_app.label: Product reviews app
product_card_reviews_app.info: Choose the app to integrate with theme's native product rating. Mind that not all 'Other' apps integrate correctly.

drawer_and_modals_settings_header.info: Applies to quick view, cart, search, header menus, and other modals without a separate setting

autoplay_mode.label: Mode
autoplay_mode.info: Seamless is only for carousel layouts

custom_color_scheme.paragraph: Applies to the media overlay, content background, and overlaid elements such as text and buttons.

disable_lazy_loading.label: Disable lazy loading
disable_lazy_loading.info: Turn it on to optimize store speed. Use only if this section comes FIRST on the page.

liquid.label: Liquid code
liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations

buy_icons_settings.icons_info: See icon styles table for reference

show_currency_selector.label: Currency selector
show_currency_selector.info: To add a currency, go to your [payment settings](https://admin.shopify.com/settings/payments)

show_language_selector.label: Language selector
show_language_selector.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](https://admin.shopify.com/settings/languages)

general_section_settings.social_media_links_settings_parapragh: Add links to your social media accounts in Theme settings>Social media

button.name: Button
button.collection_info: Leave 'Label', 'Image' and 'Link' empty to use collection's native data

collection.label: Collection
collection.info: Leave 'Item', 'Image' and button 'Link' empty to use collection's native data

api_key.label: Google Maps API key
api_key.info: Register a [Google Maps API Key](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/embed/get-api-key) to show the map

map_custom_style.label: Custom style
map_custom_style.info: Add style in JSON format; learn about [custom styles for Google Maps](https://mapstyle.withgoogle.com/)

map_default_image.label: Image
map_default_image.info: Shows when API key is inaccessible or not added

store_coordinates.label: Coordinates
store_coordinates.info: Copy the store's [latitude and longitude](https://support.google.com/maps/answer/18539?hl=en), separate values with a comma

show_directions.label: Show 'Directions' button
show_directions.info: Adds a link to Google Maps, doesn't work in theme editor

hotspots.name: Hotspots
hotspots.info_about_position: If no mobile image added, the desktop pin position is auto-applied to mobile

text.name: Text
text.default: Create urgency around sales and special offers

on_complete_options.wait_one_day: Hide and start again in one day

social_media_icons.info: Add links to your social media accounts in Theme settings>Social media

header.name: Header
header.images_block_mega_nav_item_name_info: Enter the menu item name to link the block to it. Learn about [adding header blocks](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/header-group/header#link-header-blocks-to-menu-items)

select_tags.label: Select tags
select_tags.info: Separate each tag with a comma

footer.name: Footer

follow_on_shop_settings_header.info: Allows customers to follow your store on the [Shop app](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-sales-channels/shop)

footer.policies_settings_parapragh: To add store policies, go to your [policy settings](https://admin.shopify.com/settings/legal)
footer.show_payment_icons_info: Associated with the payment providers you enable in your [payment settings](https://admin.shopify.com/settings/payments)

search.name: Search

description.content: Set up the search behavior with the [Shopify Search and Discovery app](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery)

search.info_for_enable_filtering_setting: Customize filters with the [Search and Discovery app](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)
search.info_for_show_color_swatches_setting: Adjust their shape and size in Theme settings>Swatches

products.name: Products
products.info_for_enable_filtering_setting: Customize filters with the [Search and Discovery app](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)
products.info_for_show_color_swatches_setting: Adjust their shape and size in Theme settings>Swatches

select_tags.label: Select tags
select_tags.info: Separate each tag with a comma

select_tags.label: Select tags
select_tags.info: Separate each tag with a comma

select_card_tags.label: Select tags
select_card_tags.info: Separate each tag with a comma

show_currency_code.label: Show currency code
show_currency_code.info: Only for prices in Total and Subtotal

description.content: Make the drawer active or inactive in Theme settings > Search

results_per_category.label: Results per category
results_per_category.info: Set up search categories with [Search and Discovery app](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery)

recommendations_queries.label: Recommended queries
recommendations_queries.info: Place each query in a separate line

featured_blog_posts.name: Featured blog posts
featured_blog_posts.featured_post_block_paragraph: Select 'Image' to replace the blog post's default cover with a custom image

enable_sign_in_with_shop.label: Enable 'Sign in with Shop'
enable_sign_in_with_shop.info: Allows customers to sign in to your store using their [Shop credentials](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-sales-channels/shop)

description.content: Distribute the section body among up to three columns

recently_viewed.name: Recently viewed
recently_viewed.description: The list is based on the browsing history saved to cookies. The section will be hidden until visitors view any product

collage.name: Collage
collage.block_info: Choose how many columns and rows the card occupies in the collage grid

collection_setting_header.info: Select 'Image' to replace the collection's default cover with a custom image.

link.label: Link
link.info: If left blank, the testimonial slides in from the side when you hit it

testimonials.name: Testimonials
testimonials.tip_for_link_setting_in_quote_block: If left blank, the testimonial slides in from the side when you hit it

video_alt_text.label: Video alt text
video_alt_text.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers

mute_video.label: Mute video
mute_video.info: With autoplay on, video sound is always muted

youtube_or_vimeo_video.label: External video
youtube_or_vimeo_video.info: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

transition_style.label: Transition style
transition_style.info: With seamless mode slides appear as one smooth line when you drag them

alt_text.label: Slideshow alt text
alt_text.info: Describe the slideshow content for customers using screen readers

quick_view.name: Quick view
quick_view.description: Quick view content is based on the 'Product information' section of the product template

siblings.name: Product siblings
siblings.description: Create a rich product page by linking separate products as options. Learn how to [set up product siblings](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/tutorials/set-up-product-siblings)

swatch_patterns.label: Custom colors and patterns
swatch_patterns.info: Place each rule in a separate line. [Learn how to add color swatches](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/theme-settings/swatches#custom-colors-and-patterns)

metafield_sibling_value.label: Option value label
metafield_sibling_value.info: Paste namespace and key of metafield

description.content: To show dynamic product rating, add a product review app

badges_settings_description.content: Adjust their appearance and colors in Theme settings > Product badges

description.content: Set up complementary products with the [Shopify Search and Discovery app](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery)

enable_drawer.label: Show drawer
enable_drawer.info: Drawer opens when you click on the tag area

highlight_sale_price.label: Highlight sale price
highlight_sale_price.info: For the products on sale only

show_swatches.label: Show swatches
show_swatches.info: Assign swatches to options and adjust their shape and size in Theme settings>Swatches

swatches_description.content: Assign swatches to options and adjust their syle in Theme settings>Swatches

information_drawer_setting_header.info: Add details to any option, like 'Size chart'

information_drawer_option_name_target.label: Linked option
information_drawer_option_name_target.info: Enter the option name to link it with the drawer. Example: size

information_drawer_trigger_button.label: Label
information_drawer_trigger_button.info: Enter the drawer label to introduce the content. Example: Size Guide

max_value.label: Maximum value
max_value.info: Progress bar is filled when reaching this value

enable_gift_card.label: Show recipient form for gift cards

buy_buttons.show_payment_icons_info: Associated with the payment providers you enable in your [payment settings](https://admin.shopify.com/settings/payments)

rating_block.name: Product rating
rating_block.description: To display the average product rating, add a product review app

popups.name: Popups
popups.description: Popups are a powerful tool that allows you to promote specific products, grow your mailing list and build relationships with your customers. Select the popup types that work best for your store. Learn about available [popup types.](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/popup-group/popups)

common.target_pages_description: Place each rule in a separate line. [Learn how to set up page targeting.](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/tutorials/popup-targeting-rules)
common.heading: Heading

image_position.label: Position
image_position.info: Only top or back on mobile

product_tags.label: Product tags
product_tags.description: Fill in tags to show the popup only for the products with these tags. Separate each tag with a comma. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/using-tags)

exit_intent.label: Show on exit-intent
exit_intent.description: Tracks mouse movements and retains the visitors that are going to leave. Only for browsing on desktop.

common.success_message_info: Appears after successful email submission. Not visible in the theme editor.

teaser.label: Teaser
teaser.paragraph: Show a small sticky tab after the popup is closed, allowing users to reopen it
